text.div:
This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Examples/CodeSystem/JP_MedicationAdministrationDosageMethodComment_CS defines many codes, of which the following are a subset:

CodeDisplay
01 ゆっくりと
02 できるだけ速やかに
03 遮光して投与すること
